Test.Description: The test is against the invokespecial java virtual machine instruction. It performs the following check. The IllegalAccessError is thrown if private method is member of class Sr that direct superclass of current class C and type of object is subclass of current class, also class Sr and class C are in same package. Covered assertions assert_instr26a292 assert_instr26a295 assert_instr26a296 assert_instr26a297 assert_instr26a298 assert_instr26a300 assert_instr26a301 assert_const201 assert_const203 assert_const209 assert_const208 assert_const215 assert_const228 assert_const233
